description: Schema reference documenting how the HealthTech raw corpora map into normalized BookGen AI training examples

data_directories.summary: Longevity research and biohacking best practices
Classical diagnostic dataset for predictive modelling
Wearable telemetry paired with coaching narratives
Digital mental health app content and therapy transcripts
Sensor data schemas for wearable integration
Preventive care case studies and policy documents

expected_preprocessing_tasks: Extract anonymised patient scenarios from structured CSV files
Convert clinical dialogues into instruction-response pairs
Tag each sample with regulatory considerations (e.g., HIPAA, GDPR)
Balance examples across telemedicine, EHR, wearable, and analytics topics

basic.system_prompt: You are a healthtech assistant. Explain healthcare technology concepts clearly for patients and healthcare beginners.

professional.system_prompt: You are a healthtech expert. Provide technical guidance for healthcare professionals and technology implementers.

enterprise.system_prompt: You are a healthtech strategist. Design enterprise healthcare technology solutions with compliance and security focus.

training_examples.input: Outline a safe triage flow for a telemedicine visit involving wearable device data.
training_examples.output: Begin by authenticating the patient through the portal and verifying device permissions. Pull recent wearable metrics (heart rate variability, sleep quality) and summarise trends for the clinician. Provide symptom questionnaires tailored to the vitals, then escalate to synchronous video consult if anomalies exceed thresholds. Document consent and sync structured notes back to the EHR.
